Class ec.ez.ezvm.Pattern 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ezlib.base.ParseNode
           |
           +----ec.ez.ezvm.Pattern
public abstract class Pattern
extends ParseNode
A Pattern 1) "evaluates" in a scope, 2) matches some specimen object, 3) binding names in this scope to values derived (usually extracted) from the specimen, and 4) returns whether the match was successful.

ignore()
Always succeeds while binding nothing.
mustBind(ScopeEditor, Object)
Like testBind, except that it fails by throwing an exception rather than returning null
name(String)
This is the only form of a defining occurence of a noun in an EZ program.
suchThat(Pattern, Expr)
Succeeds iff sub matches the specimen, and test -- when evaluated with the resulting bindings in scope -- evaluates to true.
testBind(ScopeEditor, Object)
The pov already represents a "hypothetical" binding environment that will only be used if the overall match succeeds.
tuple(Pattern[], Pattern)

testBind 
 public abstract ScopeEditor testBind(ScopeEditor pov,
                                      Object specimen) throws Exception, Ejection
The pov already represents a "hypothetical" binding environment that will only be used if the overall match succeeds. Otherwise, it will be discarded, along with any bindings introduce()d into it. Success is indicated by returning a Scope representing the scope in which any "then" computations should then be executed. Failure is indicated by returning null.

Returns:
nullOk;
mustBind 
 public ScopeEditor mustBind(ScopeEditor pov,
                             Object specimen) throws Exception, Ejection
Like testBind, except that it fails by throwing an exception rather than returning null

name 
 public static Pattern name(String varName)
This is the only form of a defining occurence of a noun in an EZ program. Always succeeds and binds the name to the specimen.

ignore 
 public static Pattern ignore()
Always succeeds while binding nothing.

suchThat 
 public static Pattern suchThat(Pattern sub,
                                Expr test)
Succeeds iff sub matches the specimen, and test -- when evaluated with the resulting bindings in scope -- evaluates to true.

tuple 
 public static Pattern tuple(Pattern subs[],
                             Pattern optRest)
